content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon Juan, it's a pleasure to meet you. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. What rental price do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to see the apartment before agreeing to a rental price. Can you show me around?
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Juan. I would be happy to show you around the apartment. Please let me know when you are available, and I will arrange a time that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am available at 15:00 on Saturday. Can you show me the apartment at that time?

Also, I would like to know the minimum rental price that you are willing to accept.

Thank you.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great, Juan. I can show you the apartment at 15:00 on Saturday. As for the minimum rental price, I am open to discussing that with you. Can you give me an idea of what you are looking to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine
